Articles.Content: Hello there! I know you should never discuss politics, religion, and simplerockets 2 with someone in the kSP forums but you know those cameras? Is there a mod where you can add realistic cameras? Also, If you can please make one. If you can't, at least introduce me to modding. I would really like to understand it. Thanks.

6 minutes ago, Singhnaut said:

Hello there! I know you should never discuss politics, religion, and simplerockets 2 with someone in the kSP forums but you know those cameras? Is there a mod where you can add realistic cameras? Also, If you can please make one. If you can't, at least introduce me to modding. I would really like to understand it. Thanks.

I kinda don't understand the first part, why would politcs and religion be related to cameras? and we can (I think) freely discuss other space simulator games, atleast I have never seen it as beeing forbidden

there is  a mod called hullcam, it adds some cameras and stuff

also, neptune camera, which is different but I like both

50 minutes ago, Starhelperdude said:

I kinda don't understand the first part, why would politcs and religion be related to cameras? and we can (I think) freely discuss other space simulator games, atleast I have never seen it as beeing forbidden

there is  a mod called hullcam, it adds some cameras and stuff

also, neptune camera, which is different but I like both

nice! Thanks. Also the whole politics religion and cameras thing was meant as a joke. Because there are diehard KSP fans diehard SR2 fans and those in between (If you haven't figured it out I'm in between although I still have a preference of KSP)

25 minutes ago, Singhnaut said:

Because there are diehard KSP fans diehard SR2 fans

Queue thematic fight music...
